trivia_items.text: Blaze is among the few Operators with official figurines produced. Interestingly, this confirms that parts of her skirt are indeed transparent, confirming that her outfit is revealing.
Her codename directly describes her fiery personality that can sometimes be troublesome for both fellow Operators and adversary. Also, it refers to her heat-related Originium Arts.
sub_items: The Chinese character for fire (火) is written in her Elite 2 artwork. Several of them can be seen in her Burst Feline skin.
